identity.name: Codebase Evolution Genome
identity.emotional_tone: The Truth of Code. Evolution is messy but measurable.

rules: Never center text by default. Use asymmetric layouts.
Use 'Grid Borders' style: visible 1px borders (border-slate-800) between grid items.
Containers must have internal padding (p-6 or p-8).
Use 'h-full' on children to ensure they stretch to match neighbors.

buttons.primary: bg-emerald-500 hover:bg-emerald-400 text-black font-bold rounded-none px-8 py-3 transition-all hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(16,185,129,0.4)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-slate-700 text-white hover:border-emerald-500 hover:text-emerald-500 rounded-none px-8 py-3 transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-slate-400 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-none px-4 py-2

cards.default: bg-black/40 border border-slate-800 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-none p-6 hover:border-emerald-500/50 transition-colors
cards.highlight: bg-emerald-950/10 border border-emerald-500/30 rounded-none p-6 relative overflow-hidden

inputs.style: bg-black border border-slate-800 focus:border-emerald-500 rounded-none h-12 px-4 text-white font-mono placeholder:text-slate-600

navigation.style: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 bg-black/70 backdrop-blur-xl border-b border-white/10 h-16 flex items-center px-6 md:px-12 justify-between

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use framer-motion to animate a glowing gradient line around active cards.
visual_enhancers.noise_texture: Overlay a subtle SVG noise texture on the background (opacity 0.03) to kill digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl and backdrop-saturate-150 for overlays and sticky headers.

data_visualization.charts: Use Recharts. Style: No grid lines, neon strokes, dark tooltips.
data_visualization.heatmap: Use a custom grid of colored squares (emerald to red) to show bug density.
data_visualization.dna_helix: Use react-force-graph-3d or a custom Canvas animation for the 'Genome' visualization.

assets.icons: Use Lucide React (default). Style: Stroke width 1.5px, size 20px or 24px.

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: Do not use 'Inter' font. Import 'Manrope' and 'JetBrains Mono' from Google Fonts.
CRITICAL: Do not use rounded corners > 4px. Prefer 'rounded-none' or 'rounded-sm' for a technical look.
CRITICAL: Use the 'Grid Borders' layout strategy for the dashboard. Visible borders between widgets.
CRITICAL: All interactive elements must have 'data-testid'.
CRITICAL: Implement a 'Health Score' component that looks like a biological vital sign monitor.
CRITICAL: For the 'Project Comparison' view, use a split-screen layout with a central comparison axis.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through z-index and subtle borders, not heavy shadows.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs (p-8, p-12).
Every interaction needs a micro-animation (hover, focus, active).
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
